turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can I order a drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks at Hawthorne please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a Cinnamon Dolce Latte with three pumps of hazelnut syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, hazelnut syrup is unavailable. What about something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have vanilla syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I'll take vanilla instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you will order one grande size Cinnamon Dolce Latte with three pumps of vanilla syrup. Is everything correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, everything is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order is confirmed and ready for pickup at the Starbucks in Hawthorne.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome! When can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready in about 10-15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
